message:
Get the absolute file then the parent file.

Allows using the current directory to output results files (avoiding NPE
if parent file is null).

file.patch:
@@ -102,7 +102,7 @@
     <rng.pmd.version>3.5</rng.pmd.version>
     <rng.findbugs.version>3.0.2</rng.findbugs.version>
     <rng.checkstyle.version>2.17</rng.checkstyle.version>
-    <rng.clirr.version>2.7</rng.clirr.version>
+    <rng.clirr.version>2.8</rng.clirr.version>
     <!-- Workaround to avoid duplicating config files. -->
     <rng.parent.dir>${basedir}</rng.parent.dir>

message:
Upgrade "clirr" dependency (web site).

Version 2.7 triggered a NPE: https://github.com/mojohaus/clirr-maven-plugin/issues/7
